description.narrative: We have been asked to help Philips fund their share of phase 1 of the project which targets improvements in three district hospitals and nine health facilities across three regions. Our funds represent 50% of the costs of the feasibility phase which captures the remodeling of the health facilities, installation of medical and other equipment, system strengthening, project management and running the measurement and evaluation process.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

provider-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: An activity that contains sub-activities (sub-components) which are reported separately to IATI
